Bedazzling Orb.name: Bedazzling Orb
Bedazzling Orb.flavor: As you disappear from view, an orb of bright fey light streaks toward your opponent, then erupts in a dazzling flash that leaves that foe dazed.
Bedazzling Orb.effect: Before the attack, you become invisible until the end of your turn.
Bedazzling Orb.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence or Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Bedazzling Orb.special: When you gain this power, choose Intelligence or Charisma as the ability you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.

Beguiling Bolt.name: Beguiling Bolt
Beguiling Bolt.flavor: Your mental assault leaves your foe bewildered and vulnerable to attack, as you draw on fey power to regain your ability to vanish.
Beguiling Bolt.onHit: 4d10 + Intelligence or Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target grants combat advantage (save ends).
Beguiling Bolt.onMiss: Half damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn.
Beguiling Bolt.effect: You regain the use of your fade away racial power if you have already used it during this encounter.
Beguiling Bolt.special: When you gain this power, choose Intelligence or Charisma as the ability you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.
